results.title: Essential Fire
results.creator_credit: Central Coast Media, Mark Falzon and Michael Edols
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Under southern skies”.
Fire is the generative force that has been essential in the development of Australia’s unique flora. Botanist Ian Telford reveals the resilience and ingenious adaptability of eucalypts after fire, when dormant buds protected by thick bark shoot out and seeds cracked open by heat, germinate. Even from the most severe destruction of fire, new life emerges on this continent. Presented by Ruth Hanckel.

results.title: Essence of life
results.brief_description: Explains and illustrates the main characteristics of a living organism - the ability to reproduce its own species, response to stimuli, movement and metabolism. Studies different forms of life developed on earth as conditions altered, from fresh water to dry land - fish, amphibia, birds, insects, animals and plants.

results.title: Essay writing made easy
results.creator_credit: Deakin University, Dennis Famigia, Ruth Lee and Peter Lane
results.brief_description: James Valentine takes the viewer through the six stages of essay writing: analysing the question; researching; planning; writing; and editing & presentation. Each stage is clearly presented with practical advice from both academics and students. Study guide included.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Deakin University, Dennis Famigia, Ruth Lee and Peter Lane

results.title: Espolio
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Sidney Goldsmith
results.brief_description: A film based on a poem by Earle Birney and a painting by El Greco. The theme concerns the responsibility of the innovator for the thing he makes. In the film, a carpenter builds a cross but is reluctant to become involved in the right or wrong of situations that bring men to die on crosses. His interest is in his own craftsmanship. To illustrate this moral, the filmmaker used light-pen drawings, giving color and emphasis through optical processes.

results.title: ESPN Super bouts. Vol. 12
results.brief_description: Features the rematch between Marvin Hagler, existing Middleweight championship holder and Vito Antuofermo with whom he drew in 1979 when Antuofermo was reigning champion. The action is picked up in round 2, live from The Boston Garden, Boston, Massachusetts, June 13, 1981 where Hagler is victorious. Also features a bout at The Rosemont Horizon, Rosemont, Illinois, October 10, 1981, where Hagler beats Mustaffa Hamsho in a TKO. Includes a match debrief by Al Bernstein and Sam Smith.

results.title: ESPN Super bouts. Vol. 11
results.brief_description: Features the 1979 World Middleweight Championship bout between Marvellous Marvin Hagler and defending champion Vito Antuofermo at Ceasar’s Palace, Las Vegas, Nevada, November 1979. It was a case of Hagler’s strength against the heart of mauler and brawler Antuofermo. The bout resulted in a 15 round draw. Includes a match debrief by Al Bernstein and Sam Smith.

results.title: Especially the children
results.brief_description: In the developing world, simple survival is the basic need for many children and their families. UNICEF seeks for all children the basic rights and privileges set forth in the Declaration of the Rights of the Child.

results.title: Espana Viva. Eps. 9-15
results.brief_description: The instructional Spanish course for beginners continues in this double video pack containing 7 episodes each running for 25 minutes consisting of simple conversations followed by a short film depicting local life in Spain. Ep.9: “Shopping”, ep.10: “Discussing recreational activities”, ep.11: “Making travel plans”, ep.12: “Booking a hotel”, ep.13: “Weather topics”, ep.14 “Talking about holidays”, ep.15 revises the language covered in the course and recommends “Essentials for the visitor to Spain”

results.title: Espana Viva. Eps. 1-8
results.brief_description: An instructional video course for beginners that introduces Spanish for everyday situations. Each 25 minute episode consists of simple conversations that illustrate the basic language, followed by a short film reporting on different aspects of local life. Ep. 1: “Greeting people”, ep.2: “Ordering drinks and introducing people”, ep.3: “Buying food”, ep.4: “Asking directions and where people live”, ep.5: “Do you like…? and do you speak..?”, ep.6: “Buying petrol and snacks”, ep.7: “What is your profession? and telling the time”, ep.8: “Eating out in Spain”.

results.title: Espana Viva [text]
results.brief_description: Accompanying text for the Spanish video course consisting of 15 units each containing some of the dialogues from the programs followed by explanations and exercises. Written by Derek Utley.
